Sub PeriodTons()
'This works with the workbook generated by the TonsReport macro
'Runs through each sheet and totals the daily tons into a cells by miner in a new sheet

    Dim WS_count As Integer
    Dim NewSheet As Worksheet
    Dim BlTonsCol As Integer
    Dim TonsCol As Integer
    Dim DateCol As Integer
    Dim PerStart As Double
    Dim PerEnd As Double
    Dim theDate As Date
    Dim theMonth As Variant
    Dim theYear As Variant
    Dim TargYear As Integer
    Dim j As Integer
    
    WS_count = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets.Count
    Set NewSheet = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets.Add(after:=ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(ThisWorkbook.Worksheets.Count))
    NewSheet.Name = "Summary"
    BlTonsCol = 3
    TonsCol = 4
    DateCol = 1
    TargYear = 2021
    
    
    For i = 1 To WS_count
        j = 1
        NewSheet.Cells(1, i).Value = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Name
        Do Until IsEmpty(ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, DateCol))
            theDate = DateValue(ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, DateCol))
            theMonth = Month(theDate)
            theYear = Year(theDate)
            If theYear = TargYear Then
                If theMonth = 1 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(2, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(2, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 2 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(3, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(3, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 3 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(4, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(4, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 4 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(5, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(5, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 5 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(6, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(6, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 6 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(7, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(7, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 7 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(8, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(8, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 8 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(9, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(9, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 9 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(10, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(10, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 10 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(11, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(11, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 11 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(12, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(12, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                ElseIf theMonth = 12 Then
                    NewSheet.Cells(13, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(13, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, TonsCol).Value
                End If
                    NewSheet.Cells(14, i).Value = NewSheet.Cells(14, i).Value + ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, BlTonsCol).Value
            End If
            
            j = j + 1
        Loop
    Next i
    

End Sub

Sub TonsCompare()
    Dim WS_count As Integer
    Dim NewSheet As Worksheet
    Dim j As Integer
    Dim k As Integer
    Dim BlTonsCol As Integer
    Dim TonsCol As Integer
    Dim Day As String
    Dim Years As Integer
    Dim TonsDate As Long
    
    WS_count = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets.Count
    Set NewSheet = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets.Add(after:=ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(WS_count))
    
    BlTonsCol = 3
    TonsCol = 4
    Years = 2
    Day = 43770
    j = 1
    k = 1
    
    NewSheet.Cells(j, 1).Value = Day
    NewSheet.Cells(j, 1).NumberFormat = "[$-F800]dddd, mmmm dd, yyyy"
    
    For i = j + 1 To (365 * Years)
        
        NewSheet.Cells(i, 1).Value = NewSheet.Cells(i - 1, 1).Value + 1
        NewSheet.Cells(i, 1).NumberFormat = "[$-F800]dddd, mmmm dd, yyyy"
    
    Next i
    
    For i = 1 To WS_count - 1
    
        j = 1
        TonsDate = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(j, 1).Value \ 1
        
        Do Until IsEmpty(NewSheet.Cells(j, 1).Value)
            
            If TonsDate = NewSheet.Cells(j, 1).Value Then
                k = 1
                Do Until IsEmpty(ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(k, 1).Value)
                
                    NewSheet.Cells(j, i + 1).Value = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets(i).Cells(k, BlTonsCol).Value
                    k = k + 1
                    j = j + 1
                Loop
                Exit Do
            End If
            
            
            j = j + 1
        Loop
    Next i
    

End Sub
